TopicTitle: Not able to retract solar panels.

Articles.Content:
Hi,

Has anyone got this issue too? Is it known? I can extend all solar panels but both the OX-4 panels have no option to retract..

Hi Majorjim

Both of the small extending solar panels that lack a casing do not have a retract mechanism, it was decided they needed more than just mass and cost to set them apart from the enclosed solar panels.

It's only those two, all others (except the OX-Stat and the new one from Asteroid Day) can retract.

Hi Majorjim

Both of the small extending solar panels that lack a casing do not have a retract mechanism, it was decided they needed more than just mass and cost to set them apart from the enclosed solar panels.

It's only those two, all others (except the OX-Stat and the new one from Asteroid Day) can retract.

Among stock parts, the large one (Gigantor XL) can retract as well.

Huh, I did not know this!

Thanks for clearing it up Sal.
